problem:
There exist constants $a$, $b$, $c$, and $d$ such that
\[(\sin x)^{47} = a \sin 47x + b \sin 45x + c \sin 43x + d \sin 41x + e \sin 39x + f \sin 37x + g \sin 35x + h \sin 33x + i \sin 31x + j \sin 29x + k \sin 27x + l \sin 25x + m \sin 23x + n \sin 21x + o \sin 19x + p \sin 17x + q \sin 15x + r \sin 13x + s \sin 11x + t \sin 9x + u \sin 7x + v \sin 5x + w \sin 3x + x \sin x\]for all angles $x$.  Find $x$.
